body:
For any staff who want to improve their hack detection skills, you can hit me up on Skype (live:grouchyfrog), and dw, I'm not going to trashtalk you if you ask for help, cuz you're actually trying to improve as a staff member. 

This will be giving details on and exactly how triggerbot and autoclickers work, since I see quite a few issues detecting triggerbot & autoclicker. Like inside-out. You can also ask me to fight you on a different server to show you how to detect triggerbot and what it looks like.
body_tagged:

title: For Staff Who Want to Improve

replies.body: There's not really a "way" to detect and be 100% sure about autoclickers..
replies.body_tagged: There's not really a "way" to detect and be 100% sure about autoclickers..

replies.body: there are signs though, which can actually help. Ex: Usually when someone jitterclicks, there will sometimes be a small variation in visible clicks form time to time, vs an atuoclicker, where most of the time, the sword movement will stay 100% consistent .
